named-query.name: getAllTasksEvents
named-query.query: select t from TaskEventImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllTasksEventsByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: select t from TaskEventImpl t where t.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

named-query.name: getAllBAMTaskSummaries
named-query.query: select b from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b where b.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: deleteBAMTaskSummariesForTask
named-query.query: delete from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b where b.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllAuditTasks
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllAuditTasksByUser
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t where t.actualOwner = :owner order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAuditTaskById
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId
